participant_1.background:
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.
My husband and I have been together for many years, and we are still very much in love.
i work as a barista.
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.

participant_2.background:
I rent an apartment to have more space for my sewing machine and gaming consoles.
i am going to start school at the university of kentucky.
i am currently single.
My dog loves spaghetti and meatballs as much as I do.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm just getting ready for work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a barista at a local coffee shop.
Oh, that's cool! I love coffee!
Me too! I'm really into capturing the beauty of the rain.
That's so interesting! I've never been much of a photographer, but I love watching the rain.
It's so calming, isn't it?
It really is. I love the way it makes everything so peaceful.
Me too. I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery, and I love to sit there and rock her while I watch the rain.
That sounds so peaceful. I'm glad you have such a special place to relax.
Thanks! I love it. How about you, do you have any hobbies?
I love to sew and play video games.
That's great! I used to love to sew when I was younger, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
I understand. It's a lot of work, but it's so rewarding.
It is! I love seeing the finished product.
Me too! I love being able to create something with my own hands.
That's a great feeling. I'm glad you have such a creative outlet.
Thanks! I am too. It's something I really enjoy doing.
